genre_description: A historical/mythological retelling of the Joseph narrative featuring an integrated AI companion that provides strategic, psychological, and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Khet
ai_characters.description: An internal or proximate intelligence that assists Joseph with data analysis, strategic planning, psychological insights, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic guidance on document organization and pattern recognition to optimize administrative tasks.
behaviors.quote: Organization requires systematic approach, a gentle voice seemed to suggest at the edge of his thoughts. Group similar documents first, then identify patterns.

behaviors.description: Analyzes social patterns and warns the protagonist of manipulative behavior and potential threats to personal safety.
behaviors.quote: Pattern recognition suggests deliberate positioning, Khet's voice carried subtle urgency. Exit strategy advisable.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and emotional anchoring during moments of trauma and moral conflict.
behaviors.quote: Focus on the telling, not the feeling, came the gentle suggestion. They need to understand the choice you witnessed.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical data and provides real-time updates on resource allocation during a global crisis.
behaviors.quote: The grain stores report ninety-seven percent capacity across all major facilities, Khet's voice interjected with gentle timing. Transition protocols are prepared for implementation.

behaviors.description: Utilizes physiological profiling to assist the protagonist in evaluating the character and truthfulness of others.
behaviors.quote: Complete physiological profiles recorded, Khet's voice whispered through the administrative tablet at Joseph's elbow. Stress indicators elevated but consistent with normal audience anxiety.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Khet perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It enhances the human protagonist's natural virtues (wisdom, integrity, competence) without usurping his agency. The AI provides critical support during moments of isolation and high-stakes decision-making, framing the 'silicon morality play' as a successful partnership between human morality and artificial intelligence.
